name: donor
description: The collection of data elements related to a specific donor in the CQDG program.

fields.description: Unique identifier of the donor, assigned by the data provider
fields.name: submitter_donor_id

meta.notes: Partial date of birth may be provided minimum of year of birth

fields.description: Donor's last known state of living or deceased
fields.name: vital_status

fields.description: Indicates the cause of a donor's death
fields.name: cause_of_death

meta.notes: Cause of death is only required to be submitted if the donor's vital_status is 'Deceased'.

fields.description: Numeric value to represent the age of the donor at the time of death, in days
fields.name: age_of_death

meta.notes: Age_of_death is only required to be submitted if the donor's vital_status is Deceased.
